tasks.title: White-Label Branding System Implementation
tasks.description: Develop a comprehensive white-label customization system with Vue.js components, dynamic theming engine, and seamless integration with existing Coolify UI infrastructure.
tasks.details:
This task implements a complete white-label branding system to transform the Coolify platform for enterprise multi-tenant use:

**1. Vue.js Branding Management Components** (resources/js/Components/Enterprise/WhiteLabel/):
- **BrandingManager.vue**: Main interface for managing organization branding settings with live preview functionality
- **ThemeCustomizer.vue**: Advanced color picker and CSS variable editor with real-time theme preview
- **LogoUploader.vue**: Drag-and-drop logo upload with image validation and processing
- **DomainManager.vue**: Custom domain configuration interface with DNS validation
- **EmailTemplateEditor.vue**: Visual editor for customizing notification email templates
- **BrandingPreview.vue**: Real-time preview component showing branding changes

**2. Enhanced Backend Services**:
- **WhiteLabelService.php**: Core service for branding operations, theme compilation, and domain management
- **BrandingCacheService.php**: Performance optimization with Redis caching for theme assets
- **DomainValidationService.php**: DNS and SSL certificate validation for custom domains
- **EmailTemplateService.php**: Dynamic email template compilation with branding variables

**3. Dynamic Asset Generation System**:
- Extend existing DynamicAssetController.php with advanced CSS compilation
- Implement SASS/CSS preprocessing pipeline for theme variables
- Add font loading system for custom typography
- Create favicon generation from uploaded logos
- Implement dark/light theme toggle with custom colors

**4. Inertia.js Integration Routes** (routes/web.php):
- Enterprise branding management dashboard
- Organization-specific branding settings
- Theme preview and testing interface
- Domain configuration and SSL management

**5. Database Enhancements**:
- Extend existing white_label_configs table with new theme fields
- Add branding_assets table for logo/image storage references
- Create branding_cache table for performance optimization
- Add organization_domains table for multi-domain tracking

**6. Livewire Component Integration**:
- Enhance existing components (navbar.blade.php, base.blade.php) to use dynamic branding
- Add branding context to all existing Livewire components
- Implement seamless fallback to default Coolify branding
- Create branding-aware component library

**7. Advanced Features**:
- CSS custom properties system for theme variables
- Logo SVG colorization for theme consistency
- Custom email template MJML integration
- Multi-language branding support
- A/B testing framework for branding variations
- Export/import branding configuration system

**8. Performance & Security**:
- Redis caching for compiled CSS assets
- CDN integration for logo/image serving
- CSP headers for custom CSS security
- Rate limiting for branding API endpoints
- Image optimization and resizing pipeline

tasks.title: Terraform Integration for Cloud Provisioning
tasks.description: Implement Terraform-based infrastructure provisioning with cloud provider API integration and seamless integration with existing Coolify server management system.
tasks.details:
This task implements a comprehensive Terraform integration system to enable automated cloud infrastructure provisioning:

**1. TerraformService Implementation** (app/Services/Enterprise/TerraformService.php):
- **Core Terraform Operations**: Execute terraform init, plan, apply, and destroy commands with proper state management and error handling
- **Multi-Cloud Template Generation**: Generate provider-specific Terraform configurations for AWS (EC2), GCP (Compute Engine), Azure (Virtual Machines), DigitalOcean (Droplets), Hetzner (Cloud Servers)
- **State Management**: Secure Terraform state file storage with encryption, backup, and recovery mechanisms
- **Resource Tracking**: Monitor provisioned resources, track costs, and manage resource lifecycles
- **Integration Points**: Connect with existing CloudProviderCredential model and TerraformDeployment model for credential management and deployment tracking

**2. Terraform Template System** (resources/terraform/):
- **Provider Templates**: Create modular Terraform templates for each supported cloud provider with standardized input variables (instance_type, region, disk_size, network_config, security_groups)
- **Module Structure**: Implement reusable modules for common infrastructure components (compute instances, networking, security groups, SSH key management)
- **Output Standardization**: Ensure consistent outputs across all providers (public_ip, private_ip, instance_id, ssh_private_key, ssh_public_key)

**3. Vue.js Infrastructure Management Components** (resources/js/Components/Enterprise/Infrastructure/):
- **TerraformManager.vue**: Main interface for managing infrastructure deployments with real-time status updates via WebSockets
- **CloudProviderCredentials.vue**: Secure credential management with validation and testing capabilities
- **DeploymentMonitoring.vue**: Real-time deployment progress tracking with logs and error reporting
- **ResourceDashboard.vue**: Overview of all provisioned resources across organizations with cost tracking

**4. Integration with Existing Server Management**:
- **Auto-Registration**: Automatically register successfully provisioned servers with Coolify's existing server management system
- **SSH Key Management**: Generate and configure SSH keys for secure server access post-provisioning
- **Health Checks**: Implement post-provisioning health checks to ensure servers are ready for application deployment
- **Resource Cleanup**: Proper cleanup of failed deployments and orphaned resources

**5. API Controllers and Routes** (app/Http/Controllers/Api/TerraformController.php):
- **Deployment Lifecycle**: REST API endpoints for creating, monitoring, and destroying infrastructure deployments
- **Provider Integration**: Validate cloud provider credentials and test connectivity before deployment
- **Organization Scoping**: Ensure all operations are properly scoped to user's organization with appropriate permissions
- **WebSocket Events**: Real-time deployment status updates using Laravel Broadcasting

**6. Background Job Processing** (app/Jobs/TerraformDeploymentJob.php):
- **Asynchronous Processing**: Queue-based terraform operations to prevent blocking UI operations
- **Progress Tracking**: Update deployment status and provide real-time feedback during long-running operations
- **Error Handling**: Comprehensive error handling with rollback capabilities for failed deployments
- **Retry Logic**: Implement intelligent retry mechanisms for transient failures

**7. Security and Compliance**:
- **Credential Encryption**: Leverage existing encrypted credential storage in CloudProviderCredential model
- **Audit Logging**: Track all infrastructure operations for compliance and debugging
- **Resource Quotas**: Integrate with organization resource limits and licensing system
- **Access Control**: Role-based access control for infrastructure operations within organizations

tasks.title: Enhanced API System with Rate Limiting

tasks.details:
This task implements a comprehensive enhanced API system with enterprise features for the Coolify transformation:

**1. Organization-Scoped Authentication Enhancement** (app/Http/Middleware/):
- **ApiOrganizationScope.php**: New middleware to enforce organization-based data isolation for API requests, extending existing Sanctum token authentication with organization context
- **Enhanced ApiAbility.php**: Extend existing API ability middleware to include organization-specific permissions (view:org_servers, manage:org_applications, etc.)
- **OrganizationApiTokens**: New personal access token system that includes organization scope in token abilities

**2. Tiered Rate Limiting System** (app/Http/Middleware/ApiRateLimiter.php):
- **Dynamic Rate Limits**: Implement organization tier-based rate limiting (Starter: 100/min, Professional: 500/min, Enterprise: 2000/min) that integrates with existing EnterpriseLicense model
- **Enhanced RouteServiceProvider**: Extend existing rate limiting configuration to support multiple named rate limiters (api-starter, api-professional, api-enterprise)
- **Resource-Based Limits**: Different rate limits for read vs write operations, with higher limits for deployment endpoints
- **Organization Quota Enforcement**: Integrate with existing Organization model's isWithinLimits() method for API usage tracking

**3. Comprehensive API Documentation System**:
- **Enhanced OpenAPI Generation**: Extend existing generate:openapi command to include organization-scoped endpoints, authentication schemes, and rate limit documentation
- **Developer Portal Vue Components** (resources/js/Components/Enterprise/Api/):
  - **ApiDocumentation.vue**: Interactive API explorer with live endpoint testing
  - **ApiKeyManager.vue**: Organization-scoped API token management with ability selection
  - **ApiUsageMonitoring.vue**: Real-time API usage metrics and rate limit status
- **API Testing Tools**: Postman collection generator and curl command builder

**4. Extended API Endpoints** (routes/api.php additions):
- **Organization Management**: GET/POST/PATCH/DELETE /api/v1/organizations/{id} with hierarchical access control
- **Resource Monitoring**: GET /api/v1/organizations/{id}/usage, /api/v1/organizations/{id}/metrics extending existing ResourcesCheck pattern
- **Terraform Integration**: POST/GET /api/v1/infrastructure/provision extending planned TerraformService
- **White-Label API**: GET/PATCH /api/v1/organizations/{id}/branding for programmatic branding management

**5. API Security Enhancements**:
- **Request Validation**: Comprehensive FormRequest classes for all new endpoints with organization context validation
- **Audit Logging**: Enhanced activity logging for API actions using existing Spatie ActivityLog
- **IP Whitelisting**: Per-organization IP restrictions extending existing ApiAllowed middleware
- **Webhook Security**: HMAC signature validation for outgoing webhooks

**6. Developer Experience Tools**:
- **SDK Generation**: Auto-generated PHP and JavaScript SDKs from OpenAPI specification
- **API Versioning**: Implement v2 API with backward compatibility to existing v1 endpoints
- **Error Response Standardization**: Consistent error format across all API endpoints with organization context
- **API Health Monitoring**: Enhanced /api/health endpoint with organization-specific status checks

tasks.description: Enhance existing Coolify deployment with enterprise features, integrate with new infrastructure provisioning, and add capacity-aware deployment with advanced deployment options.

**1. Enhanced Deployment Controller** (app/Http/Controllers/Api/DeployController.php):
- **Organization-Aware Deployment**: Extend existing deployment API endpoints to support organization-scoped deployments with resource quota validation
- **Advanced Deployment Options**: Add support for deployment strategies (blue-green, rolling updates, canary), resource limits per deployment, deployment priorities, and scheduled deployments
- **Terraform Integration**: Integrate with TerraformService for infrastructure-aware deployments - automatically provision infrastructure before application deployment if needed
- **Capacity-Aware Deployment**: Integrate with CapacityManager to ensure optimal server selection based on current resource usage and application requirements

**2. Enhanced Application Model** (app/Models/Application.php):
- **Organization Relationship**: Add organization relationship through server hierarchy for multi-tenant data isolation
- **Deployment Strategy Fields**: Add database columns for deployment_strategy (rolling|blue-green|canary), resource_requirements (CPU, memory, disk), deployment_priority (high|medium|low), and scheduled_deployment_time
- **Terraform Integration**: Add terraform_template_id foreign key and methods for infrastructure provisioning status tracking
- **Enhanced Deployment Methods**: Extend existing queue_application_deployment function to support new enterprise features while maintaining backward compatibility

**3. EnhancedDeploymentService** (app/Services/Enterprise/EnhancedDeploymentService.php):
- **Deployment Strategy Engine**: Implement blue-green deployments with health check validation, rolling updates with configurable batch sizes, and canary deployments with traffic splitting
- **Infrastructure Integration**: Coordinate with TerraformService to ensure required infrastructure exists before deployment, integrate with CapacityManager for intelligent server selection
- **Resource Management**: Validate deployment against organization quotas, reserve resources during deployment, implement deployment queuing with priority handling
- **Health Check Integration**: Enhanced health checking with custom validation rules, deployment rollback on health check failures, and real-time deployment status updates

**4. Enhanced ApplicationDeploymentJob** (app/Jobs/ApplicationDeploymentJob.php):
- **Strategy-Aware Deployment**: Modify existing deployment job to handle different deployment strategies while preserving existing Coolify deployment logic
- **Resource Validation**: Pre-deployment resource checks using CapacityManager, organization quota validation, and server capacity verification
- **Infrastructure Provisioning**: Automatic infrastructure provisioning via TerraformService if required, wait for infrastructure readiness before proceeding with application deployment
- **Advanced Monitoring**: Real-time deployment progress tracking, WebSocket status updates for organization dashboard, and comprehensive deployment logging

**5. Vue.js Deployment Management Interface** (resources/js/Components/Enterprise/Deployment/):
- **DeploymentManager.vue**: Advanced deployment configuration with strategy selection, resource requirement specification, and scheduling options
- **DeploymentMonitor.vue**: Real-time deployment monitoring with progress visualization, health check status, and deployment logs
- **CapacityVisualization.vue**: Visual representation of server capacity and deployment impact on resource usage
- **DeploymentHistory.vue**: Enhanced deployment history with filtering, organization-scoped views, and deployment comparison tools

**6. Database Schema Enhancements**:
- **Enhanced application_deployment_queues table**: Add deployment_strategy, resource_requirements, organization_id, terraform_deployment_id columns
- **New deployment_strategies table**: Store deployment strategy configurations per organization
- **Enhanced applications table**: Add terraform_template_id, deployment_strategy_default, resource_requirements_default columns
- **Migration scripts**: Safely migrate existing deployments while preserving all current functionality

**7. API Enhancements** (routes/api.php):
- **Organization-Scoped Endpoints**: /api/organizations/{org}/deployments, /api/organizations/{org}/applications/{app}/deploy
- **Advanced Deployment Endpoints**: /api/deployments/{uuid}/strategy, /api/deployments/{uuid}/resources, /api/deployments/{uuid}/rollback
- **Capacity Endpoints**: /api/servers/capacity, /api/applications/{uuid}/resource-requirements
- **Real-time Monitoring**: WebSocket endpoints for deployment status, resource usage monitoring, and organization dashboard updates

This enhancement preserves all existing Coolify deployment functionality while adding enterprise-grade features for multi-tenant organizations, advanced deployment strategies, and intelligent resource management.

**1. Domain Registrar Integration Service** (app/Services/Enterprise/DomainRegistrarService.php):

**2. DNS Management System** (app/Services/Enterprise/DnsManagementService.php):
- **Multi-Provider DNS**: Support DNS management across Cloudflare, Route53, DigitalOcean DNS, and Namecheap DNS APIs
- **Automated DNS Configuration**: Automatically create A/AAAA records pointing to deployed application servers during application deployment
- **Advanced Record Types**: Support for CNAME, MX, TXT, SRV records with TTL management and batch operations
- **DNS Propagation Monitoring**: Track DNS propagation status and provide real-time feedback during domain setup

**3. Enhanced Application-Domain Integration** (app/Services/Enterprise/ApplicationDomainService.php):

- **Domain Validation**: Implement domain ownership verification for organizations before allowing DNS modifications

- **dns_records table**: Cache DNS record configurations for faster management and change tracking

- **ApplicationDomainController**: API for binding domains to applications with validation

tasks.title: Cross-Branch Communication and Multi-Instance Support
tasks.description: Implement branch registry, cross-branch API gateway, federated authentication, resource sharing, distributed licensing, and multi-instance management interface for multi-tenant organizations across distributed Coolify instances.
tasks.details:
This task implements a comprehensive cross-branch communication system to enable multi-instance support for distributed enterprise organizations:

**1. Branch Registry Service** (app/Services/Enterprise/BranchRegistryService.php):
- **Instance Registration**: Register Coolify instances as branches with metadata (location, capabilities, resource capacity, organization assignments)
- **Service Discovery**: Maintain registry of available services across branches with health checking and automatic failover
- **Branch Authentication**: JWT-based inter-branch authentication with rotating keys and certificate validation
- **Resource Inventory**: Track available resources (servers, applications, databases) across all registered branches

**2. Cross-Branch API Gateway** (app/Services/Enterprise/CrossBranchApiGateway.php):
- **Request Routing**: Route API requests to appropriate branch instances based on organization context and resource location
- **Load Balancing**: Distribute requests across available branches with intelligent routing based on capacity and proximity
- **Authentication Proxy**: Forward authenticated requests with proper organization context and permissions
- **Response Aggregation**: Combine responses from multiple branches for unified dashboard views

**3. Federated Authentication System** (app/Services/Enterprise/FederatedAuthService.php):
- **Cross-Branch SSO**: Enable single sign-on across multiple Coolify instances using existing Laravel Sanctum foundation
- **Token Federation**: Share authentication tokens between trusted branches with proper scope validation
- **Organization Context Propagation**: Maintain organization hierarchy context across distributed instances
- **Permission Synchronization**: Sync user permissions and role changes across all relevant branches

**4. Distributed Resource Sharing** (app/Services/Enterprise/DistributedResourceService.php):
- **Resource Federation**: Allow organizations to access servers and applications across multiple branches
- **Cross-Branch Deployment**: Deploy applications to optimal servers regardless of branch location
- **Resource Migration**: Move resources between branches with minimal downtime
- **Capacity Optimization**: Balance resource utilization across the entire branch network

**5. Distributed Licensing System** (Enhancement to existing LicensingService):
- **License Synchronization**: Sync license status and usage across all branches in real-time
- **Distributed Usage Tracking**: Aggregate usage metrics from all branches for accurate billing
- **Feature Flag Propagation**: Ensure consistent feature availability across all instances
- **Compliance Monitoring**: Monitor license compliance across the entire distributed network

**6. Multi-Instance Management Interface** (Vue.js Components):
- **BranchTopology.vue**: Visual representation of branch network with real-time status and connectivity
- **DistributedResourceDashboard.vue**: Unified view of resources across all branches with cross-branch management capabilities
- **FederatedUserManagement.vue**: Manage users and permissions across multiple instances
- **CrossBranchDeploymentManager.vue**: Deploy and manage applications across the branch network

**7. WebSocket Communication Layer** (Enhancement to existing broadcasting):
- **Branch-to-Branch WebSocket**: Real-time communication between branches using existing Pusher/WebSocket infrastructure
- **Event Propagation**: Broadcast organization changes, deployments, and resource updates across all branches
- **Connection Management**: Handle branch connectivity issues with automatic reconnection and queuing
- **Security Layer**: Encrypted WebSocket communication with certificate-based authentication

**8. Database and Configuration**:
- **Branch Registry Tables**: Store branch information, capabilities, and health status
- **Federated Session Storage**: Shared session data using Redis clustering
- **Configuration Synchronization**: Sync critical configuration changes across branches
- **Audit Trail**: Track all cross-branch operations for compliance and debugging
